description: Oh Shit, Git!?!, Colorsinspo, Parcel, Redux Style Guite, Bot Land, Rhubarb and more...

items.title: Oh Shit Git!?!
items.description: It's easy to screw up using Git. This website helps you figuring out how to fix your mistakes.

items.title: Colorsinspo
items.description: A cool website around colors - including palettes, tools, gradients, inspiration, tutorials and more.

items.title: Parcel
items.description: A faster alternative to webpack for web application bundling.

items.title: Redux Style Guide
items.description: The new list of recommended patterns, best practices, and suggested approaches for writing Redux applications.

items.title: Beautiful React Hooks
items.description: A collection of React Hooks to speed-up the development.

items.title: Bot Land
items.description: A fun online strategy game, where you have to build and programm your own bot.

items.title: Rhubarb
items.description: A lightweight WebSocket library optimized for multiplayer JS games, which works on WebWorkers with binary data.

items.title: DarkModeDesign
items.description: A list of resources for designing and building dark mode experiences.

items.title: astuto
items.description: An open source customer feedback tool, helping to collect, manage and prioritize feedback from users.
